Name: Zoning, 515 7th Avenue, Manhattan (C 240248 ZSM).
Title: Application number C 240248 ZSM (515 7th Avenue) submitted by 515 Seventh Avenue Realty, LP, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-851 of the Zoning Resolution to allow a floor area bonus for a covered pedestrian space not to exceed the amount permitted pursuant to Section 121-31 by more than 20 percent in connection with a proposed commercial building, on property located at 515 7th Avenue (Block 813, Lot 64), in an M1-6 District, within the Special Garment Center District (Subdistrict A-3), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 5, Council District 3.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
